name: Coinbase Research
title: Weekly The Waiting Game
text:
Key Insight:
The crypto market is anticipating significant developments in 2025, including potential government-linked crypto reserves and SEC decisions on cryptocurrency ETFs, which could drive market dynamics and economic integration of digital assets.

Important Information:
- The SEC is approaching a decision deadline for the Canary Litecoin (LTC) ETF in late September or early October 2025, which could set a new precedent for crypto ETF approvals
- Over a dozen states are introducing legislation to form Bitcoin reserves, with Illinois and South Dakota recently joining the initiative
- Senator Cynthia Lummis has been appointed to head a new Subcommittee on Digital Assets with the goal of creating a national crypto reserve
- Polymarket estimates a 56% probability of a US national crypto reserve being created in 2025
- DeepSeek's R1 AI model is seen as potentially transformative for the tech industry, with implications for global economic productivity
- Coinbase's Q1 2025 market guide highlights themes of ownership transition, stablecoin growth, and Layer-2 blockchain development
